titleStmt.title: The right of succession asserted against the false reasonings and seditious insinuations of R. Dolman alias Parsons and others by ... Sir John Hayward ... ; dedicated to the King ; and now reprinted for the satisfaction of the zealous promoters of the bill of exclusion.
titleStmt.author: Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Mat. Gillyflower, Will. Hensman and Tho. Fox ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
